examples: The book describes her life from cradle to grave.
But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
And after the match, the Carlisle boss wasn't pulling his punches when describing his players' performance.
BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!
It was described as a large, luxury mobile home, but there was barely room to swing a cat.
words.defineEn: to give details about someone or something to say what they are like
words.defineVi: để cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó để nói họ như thế nào

examples: Relatives have taken up the cudgels for two British women accused of murder.
We sometimes visit our relatives during the holidays.
The couple received their relatives with open arms when they visited
A week on vacation with my relatives is enough to drive me nuts.
My family and I often travel by car to visit relatives in the countryside.
words.defineEn: a family member who is related to us by blood or marriage
words.defineVi: một thành viên gia đình có quan hệ huyết thống hoặc hôn nhân với chúng ta

examples: My knowledge of French is pretty basic.
The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
Those movie stars live pretty high off the hog.
Years of war have left their mark on these pretty islands.
words.defineEn: (of a woman or a child) attractive without being very beautiful
words.defineVi: (của một người phụ nữ hoặc một đứa trẻ) hấp dẫn mà không quá xinh đẹp

examples: Handsome, she thought, but not a patch on Alex.
With a wave of her magic wand, she changed the frog into a handsome prince.
He may have been handsome, but that was not enough to make up for his lack of character.
After all, handsome is as handsome does.
After all, handsome is as handsome does.
words.defineEn: (of a man) having an attractive face and body
words.defineVi: (của một người đàn ông) có khuôn mặt và thân hình hấp dẫn

examples: Joe Biden also had a role model: Irish, Catholic, good-looking.
I think this is one of the best-looking SUVs available right now, but there is a Range Rover that is pretty good-looking as well.
words.defineEn: someone who has an attractive and pleasing appearance
words.defineVi: một người có vẻ ngoài hấp dẫn và dễ chịu

examples: The baby had chubby cheeks and a cute face.
They're so chubby and cute.
And cute little kitties.
The smile is pretty cute.
Animals are seriously cute.
Short hair really becomes you.
The boss has a short fuse these days!
She made short work of her opponents.
We fell short of our goal in the competition.
As they say, short reckonings make long friends.
words.defineEn: (of a person) small in height; not tall
words.defineVi: (của một người) nhỏ về chiều cao; không cao

examples: The tall building stands out among the other structures in the city.
The tall oak tree provided shade on a hot summer day.
The tall Texan ruffled some English feathers with his remarks.
After dinner she told me a tall tale about her pet.
To grow bigger/taller/older.
words.defineEn: (of a person or thing) having a height that is greater than what is thought to be the average height
words.defineVi: (của một người hoặc vật) có chiều cao lớn hơn chiều cao được cho là trung bình

examples: My father is quite old now
This thankless IT support job is really getting old.
This old house gives me the willies.
The old man gave up the ghost.
The old man considered his granddaughter thoughtfully.
words.defineEn: (of a person) in the later stages of life
words.defineVi: (của một người) trong giai đoạn sau của cuộc đời

examples: The best professional musicians start young.
The young actress received an award for her outstanding performance.
Those young people have some guts.
That young woman was close as an oyster!
The young man was a twenty-one-year-old college student.
words.defineEn: still in the earlier stages of life
words.defineVi: vẫn còn trong giai đoạn đầu của cuộc sống

examples: Women wore slim dresses that came all the way to their shoes.
It otherwise looks very slim.
It's a slim wallet.
Like, that is a slim keyboard.
There’s a slim margin of time when Hedge can access the paintings.
The carpet has worn thin in places.
She includes thin slices of celery in her diet.
Her husband disappeared into thin air for years.
They built the cell phone industry out of thin air in the mid-1980s.
She layered thin slices of prosciutto between crusty bread, fresh mozzarella, and sun-dried tomatoes for a gourmet panini.
words.defineEn: (of people or animals) weighing less than what is thought to be healthy for their body
words.defineVi: (của người hoặc động vật) cân nặng thấp hơn những gì được cho là lành mạnh cho cơ thể của họ

examples: Despite her insecurities, Lisa embraced her strong and muscular legs, proudly referring to them as her thunder thighs.
This complementary partnership exists throughout the muscular system.
And so are larger, more muscular bodies.
First, what exactly is the muscular system?
All that blood exerts a force on the muscular walls of the blood vessels.
words.defineEn: (of a person) powerful with large well-developed muscles
words.defineVi: (của một người) mạnh mẽ với cơ bắp phát triển tốt

examples: I'm finding the advanced physics a bit heavy going.
They pushed the heavy box across the room.
The book is really heavy going at the beginning.
We loaded the heavy boxes onto the truck for transport.
She carried a heavy load of books in her backpack.
words.defineEn: having a lot of weight and not easy to move or pick up
words.defineVi: có nhiều trọng lượng và không dễ di chuyển hoặc nhặt lên
